licence_overview: To practise as a prosthetist, you need to register with the [Health and Care Professions Council.](http://www.hpc-uk.org "Health and Care Professions Council"){:rel="external"}
licence_short_description: Register as a prosthetist with the Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) in the UK.
overview: You need to register as a prosthetist with the Health and Care Professions Council in the UK
title: Register as a prosthetist
will_continue_on: the Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) website
